name: Arcane Scavenger
description: A large, armored construct with a robust build, resembling a fusion of mechanical components and arcane energy, capable of flight.
memorable: Its ability to explode upon death, dealing significant force damage, makes the Arcane Scavenger a dangerous opponent even after being defeated.
goals: To fend off intruders and protect arcane secrets, serving as a guardian in magical locations.
relations: Often encountered alongside other constructs or magical guardians.
environment: Typically found in magical ruins, arcane laboratories, or areas infused with magical energies.
strengths: Resistant to multiple damage types, immune to common conditions, possesses magic resistance, and truesight.
weaknesses: Lacks communication abilities and requires no sustenance, potentially hindering interaction with others.
attacks: Can make multiattacks with either powerful melee claws that deal bludgeoning and force damage, or a ranged fire attack.
most_powerful_ability: Eldritch Overload, which enhances its speed and grants an additional action when its health is low.
senses: Possesses truesight up to 60 feet, allowing it to see through illusions and invisibilities.
skills: Has a passive perception of 17, indicating a keen ability to detect hidden enemies or traps.
additional_information: Doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep due to its construct nature.
Can cast spells like Detect Magic and Locate Object at will without the need for material components.
Magic Resistance grants it advantage on saves against spells and magical effects.
When killed, unleashes a destructive explosion dealing force damage to nearby creatures.
Its Eldritch Overload ability gives it a significant increase in combat effectiveness when critically damaged.
spellcasting: Can cast Detect Magic and Locate Object at will, and each three times a day can cast Dispel Magic and Counterspell.
